title: How do I use USB tethering?
answer:
You can connect your phone to a computer and use your phone's USB tethering function to share your phone's mobile data connection with the computer. 

 Before using tethering, ensure that the USB driver for your handset is installed on your computer and your phone can access the Internet. 

 Connect your phone to the computer using a USB cable. On your phone, touch **Settings > ****More... > Tethering & portable hotspot > USB tethering**. 

 You can then access the Internet on the computer using your phone's mobile data connection.
